item.title: June Visitor
item.description: The June Visitor is available online.

item.title: Facebook Live Prayer Time
item.description: During this season of social distancing, we continue a weekly Facebook Live prayer time!

item.title: YouTube Channel
item.description: A primary way that we will continue to provide service and videos each week is through the church YouTube channel.

item.title: Visitor or Bulletin Information
item.description: If you would like an announcement in the July Visitor, please email it to Wade by Sunday, June 21.
